content: gathered scarf for your mother-in-law or not materials alpaca ware superfine alpaca yarn 3 skeins or approximately 540 yards of a fingering or dk weight yarn wpi = 14 size 4us and 7us needles finished measurements length approximately 48 inches width approximately 6 inches gauge i didn t check gauge i just went for a relatively drapey fabric you want the scarf to be soft and malleable with size 7 needles cast on 48 stitches row 1 3 5 knit row 2 4 6 purl change to size 4 needles row 7 *knit 2 together* 24 times you ll end up with 24 stitches on the needles row 8-12 knit change to size 7 needles row 13 *kfb* 24 times you ll end up with 48 stitches again repeat row 2-13 until you ve reached the length you want bind off pattern and images © 2007 by maryse roudier
